;;;4046   
;;;4047   void buffer_Analysis(u8 *buffer,u16 munber)
000000  e92d4ff3          PUSH     {r0,r1,r4-r11,lr}
;;;4048   {
000004  b091              SUB      sp,sp,#0x44
000006  4680              MOV      r8,r0

                  convert_u32_to_index PROC
;;;3050   
;;;3051   void convert_u32_to_index(float lat1, char latitude1_flag,float lng1, char longitude1_flag)
000000  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;3052   {
;;;3053       u8 du,fen,temp_vaule,temp_vaule1;
;;;3054       float miao;
;;;3055       u32 coxtern1 =0 ,coxtern2 = 0,coxtern3 = 0;
;;;3056   
;;;3057   	coxtern1 |= (latitude1_flag<<24)|(longitude1_flag<<16);
000004  0609              LSLS     r1,r1,#24
;;;3058   	du = (u8)(lat1/1000000);
000006  f8dfb260          LDR      r11,|L15.616|
00000a  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0                 ;3055
00000e  ea414803          ORR      r8,r1,r3,LSL #16      ;3057
000012  b083              SUB      sp,sp,#0xc            ;3052
000014  46ca              MOV      r10,r9                ;3055
000016  4659              MOV      r1,r11
000018  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fdiv
00001c  4605              MOV      r5,r0
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_f2uiz
000022  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;3059   	fen = (u8)((lat1/1000000 - du)*60);
000024  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000026  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_ui2f
00002a  4601              MOV      r1,r0
00002c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fsub
000032  498e              LDR      r1,|L15.620|
000034  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fmul
000038  4605              MOV      r5,r0
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_f2uiz
00003e  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;3060   	miao = ((lat1/1000000 - du)*60 -fen)*600;
000040  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000042  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_ui2f
000046  4601              MOV      r1,r0
000048  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00004a  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fsub
00004e  4988              LDR      r1,|L15.624|
000050  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fmul
000054  4607              MOV      r7,r0
;;;3061   
;;;3062       v1000_debug("\r\n convert_u32_to_index  %.1f  ",miao);
000056  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_f2d
00005a  4602              MOV      r2,r0
00005c  460b              MOV      r3,r1
00005e  a085              ADR      r0,|L15.628|
000060  f7fffffe          BL       __2printf
;;;3063       if(miao >599.0)
000064  488b              LDR      r0,|L15.660|
000066  4287              CMP      r7,r0
000068  dd06              BLE      |L15.120|
;;;3064       {
;;;3065       	miao = 0.0;
00006a  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1
00006c  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
;;;3066       	fen++;
00006e  b2f6              UXTB     r6,r6
;;;3067       	if(fen>59)
000070  2e3b              CMP      r6,#0x3b
000072  d901              BLS      |L15.120|
000074  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
;;;3068       		du++;
000076  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L15.120|
;;;3069       }
;;;3070   	if(du<100)
;;;3071   	{
;;;3072           coxtern1 |= ' '<<8;
;;;3073           temp_vaule = du/10;
000078  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
00007a  2c64              CMP      r4,#0x64              ;3070
00007c  d20d              BCS      |L15.154|
00007e  fbb4f0f1          UDIV     r0,r4,r1
;;;3074           coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule<<28);
000082  ea497200          ORR      r2,r9,r0,LSL #28
;;;3075           //	  v1000_debug("\r\n temp_vaule  %d  ",temp_vaule);
;;;3076           temp_vaule = du -(temp_vaule*10);
000086  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
000088  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00008c  eb040040          ADD      r0,r4,r0,LSL #1
000090  f4485500          ORR      r5,r8,#0x2000         ;3072
;;;3077           //	 v1000_debug("\r\n temp_vaule  %d  ",temp_vaule);
;;;3078           coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule<<24);
000094  ea426000          ORR      r0,r2,r0,LSL #24
000098  e018              B        |L15.204|
                  |L15.154|
;;;3079   	}
;;;3080   	else
;;;3081   	{
;;;3082           temp_vaule = du/100;
00009a  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
00009c  fbb4f0f0          UDIV     r0,r4,r0
;;;3083           coxtern1 |= ((temp_vaule+'0')<<8);
0000a0  f44f5240          MOV      r2,#0x3000
0000a4  eb022500          ADD      r5,r2,r0,LSL #8
;;;3084           temp_vaule1 = ((du-temp_vaule*100)/10);
0000a8  f06f0218          MVN      r2,#0x18
0000ac  4350              MULS     r0,r2,r0
0000ae  eb040280          ADD      r2,r4,r0,LSL #2
0000b2  fb92f0f1          SDIV     r0,r2,r1
;;;3085           coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule1<<28);
0000b6  ea497300          ORR      r3,r9,r0,LSL #28
;;;3086           temp_vaule = (du -(temp_vaule*100)-(temp_vaule1*10));
0000ba  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
0000bc  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
0000c0  eb020040          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #1
0000c4  ea450508          ORR      r5,r5,r8              ;3083
;;;3087           coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule<<24);
0000c8  ea436000          ORR      r0,r3,r0,LSL #24
                  |L15.204|
;;;3088   	}
;;;3089   
;;;3090       temp_vaule = fen/10;
0000cc  4688              MOV      r8,r1
0000ce  fbb6f1f8          UDIV     r1,r6,r8
;;;3091       coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule<<20);
0000d2  ea405001          ORR      r0,r0,r1,LSL #20
;;;3092       temp_vaule = (fen -temp_vaule*10);
0000d6  4249              RSBS     r1,r1,#0
0000d8  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
0000dc  eb060141          ADD      r1,r6,r1,LSL #1
0000e0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;3093       coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule<<16);
0000e2  ea404401          ORR      r4,r0,r1,LSL #16
;;;3094       
;;;3095       temp_vaule = (u8)(miao/100);
0000e6  496c              LDR      r1,|L15.664|
0000e8  4638              MOV      r0,r7
0000ea  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fdiv
0000ee  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_f2uiz
0000f2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;3096   	//  v1000_debug("\r\n temp_vaule  %d  ",temp_vaule);
;;;3097   	coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule<<12);
0000f4  ea443400          ORR      r4,r4,r0,LSL #12
;;;3098   	temp_vaule1 = (u8)(miao -temp_vaule*100)/10;
0000f8  2164              MOVS     r1,#0x64
0000fa  4348              MULS     r0,r1,r0
0000fc  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_ui2f
000100  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000102  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_frsub
000106  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000108  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_f2uiz
00010c  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
00010e  fbb1f0f8          UDIV     r0,r1,r8
;;;3099   //	  v1000_debug("\r\n temp_vaule1  %d  ",temp_vaule1);
;;;3100   	coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule1<<8);
000112  ea442400          ORR      r4,r4,r0,LSL #8
;;;3101   	temp_vaule1 = (u8)(miao -(temp_vaule*100) - (temp_vaule1*10));
000116  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00011a  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
00011c  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_ui2f
000120  4601              MOV      r1,r0
000122  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000124  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_fsub
000128  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_f2uiz
00012c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;3102   //	  v1000_debug("\r\n temp_vaule1  %d  ",temp_vaule1);
;;;3103   	coxtern2 |= (temp_vaule1<<4);
00012e  ea441900          ORR      r9,r4,r0,LSL #4
;;;3104   
;;;3105   
;;;3106

                  menu_Pressure_display PROC
;;;2088   
;;;2089   void menu_Pressure_display(void)
000000  e92d4ff8          PUSH     {r3-r11,lr}
;;;2090   {
;;;2091   	
;;;2092   	u8 i;
;;;2093   	signed char y;
;;;2094   	static signed char old_y1;
;;;2095   	float tp,tp_most,tp_lest,pressure_unit;
;;;2096   
;;;2097   	OLED_Fill(0, 0, 127, 63, 0);
000004  2000              MOVS     r0,#0

;;;2098   
;;;2099   #ifdef baoyu
;;;2100       if(baoyun_flag)
;;;2101   		Movie_Show_Img(0,29,Bmp_wanner);
;;;2102   #endif
;;;2103   	if(system_flag_table->lang == 1)
000012  4eba              LDR      r6,|L26.764|
000014  6830              LDR      r0,[r6,#0]  ; system_flag_table
000016  f890002b          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x2b]

                          AREA ||i.menu_enter_flash||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  menu_enter_flash PROC
;;;5501   
;;;5502   void menu_enter_flash(u16 my_timer_flash)
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;5503   {
;;;5504       if(KeyTab[keyTabIndex].subnumber == 'S')
000002  4c3e              LDR      r4,|L31.252|
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0                 ;5503
000006  4f3c              LDR      r7,|L31.248|
000008  7ba0              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0xe]  ; keyTabIndex
00000a  eb071000          ADD      r0,r7,r0,LSL #4
00000e  7b00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xc]
000010  2853              CMP      r0,#0x53
000012  d16f              BNE      |L31.244|
000014  2500              MOVS     r5,#0                 ;5503
;;;5505   	{
;;;5506   	    if((my_timer_flash == 0)||(my_timer_flash == 200)||(my_timer_flash == 100))
000016  b1be              CBZ      r6,|L31.72|
000018  2ec8              CMP      r6,#0xc8
00001a  d015              BEQ      |L31.72|
00001c  2e64              CMP      r6,#0x64
00001e  d013              BEQ      |L31.72|
;;;5507   		{
;;;5508       		OLED_Fill(0, 28, 15, 63, 0);
;;;5509       		if(menu_updown_flag)
;;;5510       		{
;;;5511       			if(menu_updown_flag == 2)
;;;5512       				Movie_Show_Img(4,40,BMP_CHOOSE1);
;;;5513       			else

                  menu_show_sl_number PROC
;;;2476   
;;;2477   void menu_show_sl_number(u8 number,u8 index)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;2478   {
000004  b08a              SUB      sp,sp,#0x28
000006  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000008  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;2479   
;;;2480       const u8 *sl_number[]={BMp_0,BMp_1,BMp_2,BMp_3,BMp_4,BMp_5,BMp_6,BMp_7,BMp_8,BMp_9};
00000a  2228              MOVS     r2,#0x28
00000c  4918              LDR      r1,|L47.112|
00000e  4668              MOV      r0,sp
000010  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy4
;;;2481   
;;;2482   
;;;2483       if(number<=9)
;;;2484   	{
;;;2485       	Movie_Show_Img_3(index*10,55,BMp_0);
000014  eb040084          ADD      r0,r4,r4,LSL #2
;;;2486       	Movie_Show_Img_3(index*10+4,55,sl_number[number]);
000018  2204              MOVS     r2,#4
00001a  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1              ;2485
00001c  eb040184          ADD      r1,r4,r4,LSL #2
000020  466e              MOV      r6,sp                 ;2480
000022  eb020441          ADD      r4,r2,r1,LSL #1
000026  2d09              CMP      r5,#9                 ;2483
000028  d806              BHI      |L47.56|
00002a  4a12              LDR      r2,|L47.116|
00002c  2137              MOVS     r1,#0x37              ;2485
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       Movie_Show_Img_3
000032  f8562025          LDR      r2,[r6,r5,LSL #2]
000036  e014              B        |L47.98|
                  |L47.56|
;;;2487   	}
;;;2488       else
;;;2489   	{
;;;2490   
;;;2491   	    if(number>99)
000038  2d63              CMP      r5,#0x63

;;;1303

                  read_the_interest_place PROC
;;;2748   
;;;2749   void read_the_interest_place(u32 *lat1, char *latitude1_flag,u32 *lng1, char *longitude1_flag,u8 index)

                          AREA ||i.show_levev_space||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  show_levev_space PROC
;;;623    /*get free size of flash !!!*/
;;;624    void show_levev_space(void)
000000  b57f              PUSH     {r0-r6,lr}
;;;625    {
;;;626    
;;;627        FATFS *fs;
;;;628        DWORD fre_clust, fre_sect, tot_sect;
;;;629        FRESULT res = FR_OK;
;;;630        float tp;
;;;631    	
;;;632        /* Get volume information and free clusters of drive 1 */
;;;633        res = f_getfree("", &fre_clust, &fs);

000004  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000006  a02b              ADR      r0,|L65.180|

;;;634        if (res) 
;;;635        {
;;;636            v1000_debug("f_getfree faild :%d\r\n",res);
;;;637            //return ;
;;;638        }
;;;639        else
;;;640        {
;;;641            /* Get total sectors and free sectors */
;;;642            tot_sect = (fs->n_fatent - 2) * fs->csize;
;;;643            fre_sect = fre_clust * fs->csize ;
;;;644            
;;;645            /* Print the free space (assuming 512 bytes/sector) */
;;;646            //v1000_debug("%10lu KiB total drive space.\r\n%10lu KiB available.\r\n",
;;;647            //tot_sect / 2, fre_sect / 2);
;;;648            tp = fre_sect;
;;;649            tp =((tp/tot_sect) *100);
;;;650            if(tp < 1)
;;;651            {
;;;652    		    if(tp < 0.1)
;;;653                    tp = 0.0;
;;;654    			else
;;;655    				tp = 1.0;
;;;656            }
;;;657            system_flag_table->baifenbi = (u8)tp;

000014  f7fffffe          BL       __2printf
000018  e024              B        |L65.100|
                  |L65.26|
00001a  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]            ;642
00001c  9901              LDR      r1,[sp,#4]            ;643
00001e  6944              LDR      r4,[r0,#0x14]         ;642

                  |L65.86|

                  |L65.88|

00005e  6829              LDR      r1,[r5,#0]  ; system_flag_table
000060  f881003e          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x3e]
                  |L65.100|
;;;658    //        system_flag_table->fre_clust = fre_clust;
;;;659        }
;;;660    
;;;661        
;;;662        if(tp >= 99.8)

;;;663        {

                  test_sunriset PROC
;;;3657   
;;;3658   int test_sunriset(u16 year,u8 month,u8 day,float lon,float lat)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;3659   {
000004  b088              SUB      sp,sp,#0x20
000006  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;3660   
;;;3661   	float sunrise = 0.0;

;;;3662       float sunset = 0.0 ;
00000a  9005              STR      r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;3663   	float altit = -35.0/60.0,upper_limb = 1.0;
;;;3664   
;;;3665   	float zone = time_zone;

00000e  4838              LDR      r0,|L69.240|

;;;3669       
;;;3670   	sunriset( year, month, day, lon, lat,
